title: Support Services Management Instruction Letter (IIT- S140-01) | Yönerge
text: Instruction No IIT- S140-01 Effective Date 13-01-2012 Update Date 12-06-2024 Related Unit / Owner IT / Bilgi Teknolojileri Direktörlüğü Approved by BT / Board of Trustees Aim BT birimi tarafından sağlanan destek hizmetlerini, yöntem ve iletişim kanallarını açıklamak. Scope IT department support services are within the scope of this document. Principle - IT department support services apply to hardware, software, and applications provided by the University. - IT support services are provided through SUTicket. Statutory Basis Definitions / Abbreviations SU: Sabancı University IT: Information Technologies Suticket: Call recording/tracking application Call: User support request Regulations 1. User Support Services 1.1. Problems encountered while using all services listed in the IT unit service catalog, and suggestions for improvement, are received through SUTicket . Link: http://suticket.sabanciuniv.edu 1.2 . Hardware and software support for student computers is provided by the Information Technologies Support Center based on individual student requests. Contact information and working hours are provided below. Campus Address: IT Unit, 1028 Form: Link: http://suticket.sabanciuniv.edu 1.3. Requests and suggestions submitted outside the communication channels specified in the Call Management Procedure will not be considered and will not be included in the evaluation of Call Center service quality performance. 1.4. Support is only available to active Sabanc ı University employees and students. 1.5. User requests for assistance are handled in accordance with the Call Management (PIT-S140-0101) procedure.
